name: Double Boy
description:
(Made for the Dani's Basement Jam)
Controll two little paper boys, at the same time!!
Run, Jump, Flutter, and even die, in this short and sweet puzzle-platformer! My mom says it's great so you gotta play it.

Arrow keys to move
Spacebar to jump/flutter

I left way too little time for level design, the game turned out real short. I like how polished it feels tho, also it looks pretty good imo
